critique: This document is an executive order granting a day off to Civil War veterans to attend a reburial ceremony. It is difficult to assess its position on the traditional left-right political spectrum. There is no mention of immigration. The order does not curtail presidential power. The order does not address the balance of power between state and federal governments. There is no mention of national security or civil liberties. The order does not address economic regulation. The order does not address social inclusion.
